title: SOLD: 1907-09 HM Taylor "Hughie and his Tigers" PC
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1907-09 HM Taylor "Hughie and his Tigers" PC
posts.post_content:
Very rare H.M. Taylor Hugh Jennings/Tigers postcard. October 4, 1907 postmark from Detroit -- just four days before Game 1 of the World Series between the Tigers and the Cubs.  Just three graded by SGC.  Email or PM if interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/KtNonw][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8319/28537936824_08c1953304_z.jpg[/img][/url]
